field.name: summary
field.value: values initialized by factory facility are overwritten by kernel

field.name: description
field.value: if component has a property A and factory.Create( int a ) method takes in a parameter with the same name, after factory initializes component.A with custom value kernel overwrites it with the value from configuration file (that was supposed to be consumed only by the factory?) 5 parameter should be consumed only by the factory. should never reach component. or if this is the design it needs to be documented in th factory documentation.
